mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_RECEIVE_MESSAGE (ID, RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{receiverId}, #{senderId})
mapper.select: SELECT RM.ID AS ID, RM.RECEIVER_ID AS RECEIVER_ID, RM.SENDER_ID AS SENDER_ID, RM.RECEIVE_MESSAGE_CHECK AS ISCHECKED, M.MESSAGE_ALL_CONTENT AS CONTENT, M.MESSAGE_ALL_DATE AS RECEIVE_DATE, SENDER.MEMBER_EMAIL AS SENDEREMAIL, SENDER.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS SENDERNICKNAME FROM TBL_RECEIVE_MESSAGE RM JOIN TBL_MESSAGE M ON RM.ID = M.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER SENDER ON RM.SENDER_ID = SENDER.ID WHERE rm.RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId}
